snippet.title: Defenders of the Omniverse | Official Cinematic Teaser
snippet.description:
When the hordes of evil are on the march, the Omniverse calls on the mightiest heroes from across time and space, the DEFENDERS OF THE OMNIVERSE!

📅 Launching in Early Access on Steam: August 26, 2024
🔥 Wishlist now! - https://bit.ly/4bUsEuy

Twitter: @BabushkaEnt
Discord: https://discord.gg/dgtPYxvjgt

Made by Zhee Shee

Director: Konstantin Struve
Art director: Alexey Orlov
Lead producer: Dasha Sharonova
Producer: Lisa Makedonskaya
Lead animator: Maria Kuzmenko
2D background artist: Marina Krylova
2D character artist: Maxim Shagovikov
Layouts: Marina Krylova
Animatic: Daria Belaya
Animators: Ksenia Chingachikova, Daria Belaya, Kristina Matveychuk, Valeria Bogdanova, Anna Azarova, Galina Pugach, Vera Zamkovaya, Natalya Kalashnikova
VFX: Ilya Pavlov
Compositing: Sirazetdinov Ismay
Storyboard: Aset Kairambayev
Background concepts: Egor Golopolosov
Music and sound design: Russell Evseev
